summary: phonetic/visual alternative hebrew keyboard map, ISO-8859-8 chars
name: phoneticvisual-hebrew-keyboard-mapphone
description:
A phonetic/visual Hebrew alphabet keyboard map, for entering to ISO-8859-8 hebrew chars.
Different than the 'internal' map.

The usage of 'reversed-insert' mode is configurable.
install_details:
better
:set noallowrevins
since we fake that in the script, then
:so <script.vim>
